results.name: Expansion of 1/(1-64*x)^(1/8), related to octo-factorial numbers A045755.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
A. Straub, V. H. Moll, T. Amdeberhan, The p-adic valuation of k-central binomial coefficients, Acta Arith. 140 (1) (2009) 31-41, eq (1.10)
formula: D-finite with recurrence: n*a(n) +8*(-8*n+7)*a(n-1)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 28 2020
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
ext: Corrected a(11) -- Harvey P. Dale, May 20 2011.
